channel.title: Pretty Noob Q: How do I make a log-in starter? [In inventory]
channel.description:
Title pretty much explains it.
I want players who FIRST log into my server, start off with a few items. --I'm making a Runescape remake from 2005 with one of my friends, so. We're trying to figure out how we can make an auto-login starter of the Runescape items after Tutorial Island. Tutorial Island is a little too advanced to make for me. ^^" So we're skipping it.
Any help? ~Epic.
P.S. We're using a Blank Source.

item.title: Pretty Noob Q: How do I make a log-in starter? [In inventory]
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Unfortunately, the source’s coding I was using got a tad messed up, to the point where it was unfixable… (Basically too many errors after fixing an error multiple times.)

I no longer need help with this. Thanks though :s

Read full topic
item.source: Pretty Noob Q: How do I make a log-in starter? [In inventory]

item.title: Pretty Noob Q: How do I make a log-in starter? [In inventory]
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

Yep what he said. This what I use.

if(starter == 0){ starter = 1; showInterface(3559); apset = true; addItem(1323, 1); addItem(882, 1000); addItem(995, 100000); addItem(1725, 1); addItem(542, 1); addItem(554, 1000); addItem(555, 1000); addItem(556, 1000); addItem(557, 1000); addItem(558, 1000); addItem(559, 1000); addItem(560, 1000); addItem(561, 1000); addItem(562, 1000); addItem(563, 1000); addItem(564, 1000); addItem(565, 1000); addItem(566, 1000); addItem(544, 1); addItem(3105, 1); addItem(6800, 1); infodia("Welcome to *****!", "You can earn money by skilling and PKing", "All teleports are in the spellbook, no runes needed ", "Thanks for playing ****** and enjoy"," Game Guide"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Pretty Noob Q: How do I make a log-in starter? [In inventory]

item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

In the initialize void make it add items than register the players starter as true.
